posts.post_title: FS: 1887 Old Judge N172 - Jim McCormick
posts.post_content:
Here it is, one of the more difficult OJ cards to get...

1887 Old Judge N172 - Jim McCormick - Authenticated by GAI

$900 (paypal accepted, I have it listed on ebay as well)

[IMG]http://247hq.com/jm.jpg[/IMG]
How much if we want the whole card?

[quote name="oldjudge" post=781140]How much if we want the whole card?[/QUOTE]

I'm not sure if you were trying to be funny or what?  Obviously it would be graded much higher if it wasn't trimmed and rebacked.

Are you asking what I would charge if it was in a different condition?
